title: Carson Block on Meme Stocks, ESG, Fraud Hunting in China and Beyond
description: The bearish hedge fund manager chats with Financial News' Deputy Editor Trista Kelley about how he plays these wobbly markets, and how to spot a market dud to sell short.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
